T = int(input())
for i in range(T):
    (A, B, C) = list(map(int, input().split()))
    healthLvl = min(B, C)
    B = B - healthLvl
    C = C - healthLvl
    Sum = B + C
    if A != 0 and A > Sum:
        print('YES')
    else:
        print('NO')

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (x, y, z) = map(int, input().split())
    p = x
    q = y
    r = z
    a = min(x, y)
    x = x - a
    y = y - a
    b = min(y, z)
    y = y - b
    z = z - b
    c = min(x, z)
    x = x - c
    z = z - c
    if x > 0:
        print('YES')
    else:
        a = min(q, r)
        q = q - a
        r = r - a
        b = min(p, q)
        p = p - b
        q = q - b
        c = min(p, r)
        p = p - c
        r = r - c
        if p > 0:
            print('YES')
        else:
            print('NO')

for i in range(int(input())):
    (x, y, z) = map(int, input().split())
    min3 = min(y, z)
    y = y - min3
    z = z - min3
    min4 = min(x, y)
    x = x - min4
    y = y - min4
    min5 = min(x, z)
    x = x - min5
    z = z - min5
    if x > 0:
        print('YES')
    else:
        print('NO')

for _ in range(int(input())):
    (x, y, z) = map(int, input().split())
    l = min(y, z)
    y -= l
    z -= l
    print('YES' if x > y + z else 'NO')

for i in range(t):
    (a, b, c) = map(int, input().split())

        print('YES')
